title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in the dynamic text item and the data/text item is different.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.
2. Observe the format of the datetime values in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
